Detailed Description

cvmx_bgx::_gmp_gmi_rx::_decision

This register specifies the byte count used to determine when to accept or to filter a packet. As each byte in a packet is received by GMI, the L2 byte count is compared against [CNT]. In normal operation, the L2 header begins after the PREAMBLE + SFD (BGX()_GMP_GMI_RX()_FRM_CTL[PRE_CHK] = 1) and any optional UDD skip data (BGX()_GMP_GMI_RX()_UDD_SKP[LEN]).
